@graph.name: Lucy World – شیکردنەوەی گەڕانی ناوخۆیی بۆ کوردستان
@graph.description: Lucy World tracks live search demand and AI clustering for Kurdish audiences so teams plan weekly campaigns and sustainable growth with confidence.
